title: fried salmon with broccoli
description: Get dinner on the table in 10 minutes with this simple salmon dish that gets added flavour from zesty lemon. Serve with broccoli to help you on the way to 5 a day.
ingredients: 150g/5½oz salmon fillet, skin on, thickly sliced
½ lemon, juice only, plus lemon wedges to garnish
salt and freshly ground black pepper
